page.topic: The COLOR_NAME_FROM_RGB() function returns an Alpha Anywhere color name (if it exists) for an RGB value.
page.description: Returns the Alpha Five name for the color specified by the RGB values.
page.syntax: Name as C = color_name_from_rgb(C r ,C g ,C b [,C dec_hex ])

argument.name: Name
argument.description: The Alpha Anywhere color name, if it exists.

argument.name: r
argument.description: The red value. A character string containing a number between 0 and 255.

argument.name: g
argument.description: The green value. A character string containing a number between 0 and 255.

argument.name: b
argument.description: The blue value. A character string containing a number between 0 and 255.
